name: Flirt world
description:
There is a handsome young man who swims at the university. One day after school, he went to the university pool to practice. But he noticed that there were glowing stones in the water. So he jumped into the pool to pick up the rock. But he don't know this plunge would change his life forever.

HOW  TO  PLAY :

Left Click - Chose Choice
